Introduction
This topic contains information about other cardiovascular disabilities, including
evaluating Raynaud’s syndrome and Raynaud’s disease
testing requirements for peripheral arterial disease
, and
changes in the rating schedule for the cardiovascular system
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5 - Cardiovascular System Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5, Section None
